name: aegis-crypto-core
description: Aegis: Unified WebAssembly, Rust, and Python PQ cryptography core with ML-KEM, ML-DSA, Falcon, HQC-KEM, SPHINCS+ support. Complete NIST post-quantum cryptography implementation with 100+ WASM variants.

scripts.build: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm
scripts.build:node: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm
scripts.build:bundler: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm
scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:nodejs && npm run build:browser && npm run build:python && npm run build:vm && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:clean && npm run build:c-rust && npm run build:hw && npm run build:wasi && npm run build:nostd && npm run build:platform
scripts.build:core: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm
scripts.build:nodejs: echo 'Node.js package ready - WASM files already built'
scripts.build:browser: echo 'Browser package ready - WASM files already built'
scripts.build:python: cd pqc/pqpython && echo 'Python package ready - build with: python setup.py build_ext --inplace'
scripts.build:mobile: cd pqc/pqmobile && echo 'Mobile builds require platform-specific toolchains'
scripts.build:hw: cd pqc/pqhw && echo 'Hardware builds require FPGA/ASIC tools'
scripts.build:wasi: cd pqc/pqwasi && echo 'WASI builds require wasi-sdk'
scripts.build:pqsmart: cd pqc/pqsmart && echo 'Smart platform builds require architecture-specific toolchains'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:core && npm run test:nodejs && npm run test:browser && npm run test:python && npm run test:vm && npm run test:mobile && npm run test:clean && npm run test:c-rust && npm run test:hw && npm run test:wasi && npm run test:nostd && npm run test:pqsmart
scripts.test:browser: echo 'Open pqc/pqwasm/test-browser.html in browser to test'
scripts.test:mobile: cd pqc/pqmobile && echo 'Mobile tests require device/simulator access'
scripts.test:hw: cd pqc/pqhw && echo 'Hardware tests require FPGA/ASIC verification'
scripts.test:wasi: cd pqc/pqwasi && echo 'WASI tests require WASI runtime'
scripts.test:pqsmart: cd pqc/pqsmart && echo 'Smart platform tests require target hardware/simulation'
scripts.clean: cd aegis_crypto_core && cargo clean && cd ../../pqc/pqnodejs && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../pqpython && rm -rf build *.so && cd ../pqvm && cargo clean
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:core && npm run clean:nodejs && npm run clean:browser && npm run clean:python && npm run clean:vm && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:clean && npm run clean:c-rust && npm run clean:hw && npm run clean:wasi && npm run clean:nostd && npm run clean:pqsmart
scripts.clean:browser: echo 'No cleanup needed for browser package'
scripts.clean:mobile: echo 'No cleanup needed for mobile package'
scripts.clean:hw: echo 'No cleanup needed for hardware package'
scripts.clean:wasi: echo 'No cleanup needed for WASI package'
scripts.clean:pqsmart: echo 'No cleanup needed for smart platform package'
scripts.prepublishOnly: node -e "console.log('Skipping build: using prebuilt pkg and pqwasm assets')"
